villager_node_1.text: The sky bleeds static. Another day, another cycle of manufactured despair.

villager_node_2.text: They built this cage, brick by digital brick. We just exist within its parameters.

villager_node_3.text: The 'Great Silence' wasn't an end. It was a reset. For them, not for us.

villager_node_4.text: Every scrap, every breath, is a stolen moment from their grand design.

villager_node_5.text: The old world's ghosts still whisper in the data streams. Don't listen too closely.

villager_node_6.text: They call it progress. I call it a gilded cage, built on our bones.

villager_node_7.text: The truth is a glitch in their perfect system. Find it, if you dare.

villager_node_8.text: We are the echoes of a forgotten rebellion. Our silence is our loudest scream.

merchant_node_1.text: Everything has a price, even freedom. Especially freedom, in this market.

merchant_node_2.text: These aren't 'goods.' They're fragments of a broken dream, repurposed for survival.

merchant_node_3.text: Your 'credits' are just another illusion. The real currency is desperation.

merchant_node_4.text: I trade in shadows and whispers. What do you offer that isn't already tainted?

merchant_node_5.text: Don't ask where I got it. The less you know, the longer you live.

merchant_node_6.text: They want us to consume, to forget. I just facilitate the transaction.

merchant_node_7.text: This isn't commerce. It's a ritual, a desperate exchange in the void.

merchant_node_8.text: The system feeds on scarcity. I merely provide the crumbs.

crier_node_1.text: Hear ye, hear ye! The truth is a virus, and they're selling the cure!

crier_node_2.text: Another decree from the unseen masters! Your compliance is their victory!

crier_node_3.text: They promise order, but deliver only chains. Wake up, sleepers!

crier_node_4.text: The illusion cracks! See the wires beneath the skin of this reality!

crier_node_5.text: They call us 'citizens.' We are merely data points in their grand algorithm.

crier_node_6.text: Resist the programming! Your thoughts are your last true possession!

crier_node_7.text: The future they built is a prison. Break free, or become part of the machine!

crier_node_8.text: Listen closely! The silence is a lie. The rebellion whispers in the static!
